mapper.sql: uid, openid, stockmax, stock, gold, diamond, newgamer, sound, biggestanimalid, viplv, vipreward, vip, invitevip, todaysign, weeksign, rounds, rankchallengenum, refreshworldnum, speedincubate, lastweekrank, lastweekreward, totalincubate, lasttime, rankpermission, phonefare, phonefarenumber, sitedata, animaldata, taskdata, dartnum, buildingdata, step,missnum
mapper.select: select data.uid, data.openid, data.stockmax, data.stock, data.gold, data.diamond, data.newgamer, data.sound, data.biggestanimalid, data.viplv, data.vipreward, data.vip , data.invitevip, data.todaysign, data.weeksign, data.rounds, data.rankchallengenum, data.refreshworldnum, data.speedincubate, data.lastweekrank, data.lastweekreward, data.totalincubate, data.lasttime, data.rankpermission, data.phonefare, data.phonefarenumber, data.sitedata, data.animaldata, data.taskdata, data.dartnum , data.buildingdata , data.step, data.missnum info.avatar , info.nickname from player_data data left join player_info info on data.openid=info.openid where data.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update player_data
stockmax = #{stockmax,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gold = #{gold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diamond = #{diamond,jdbcType=INTEGER},
newgamer = #{newgamer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sound = #{sound,jdbcType=INTEGER},
biggestanimalid = #{biggestanimalid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
viplv = #{viplv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vipreward = #{vipreward,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip = #{vip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invitevip = #{invitevip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
todaysign = #{todaysign,jdbcType=BIT},
weeksign = #{weeksign,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rounds = #{rounds,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rankchallengenum = #{rankchallengenum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
refreshworldnum = #{refreshworldnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
speedincubate = #{speedincubate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lastweekrank = #{lastweekrank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lastweekreward = #{lastweekreward,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalincubate = #{totalincubate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lasttime = #{lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rankpermission = #{rankpermission,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phonefare = #{phonefare,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phonefarenumber = #{phonefarenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sitedata = #{sitedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
animaldata = #{animaldata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskdata = #{taskdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dartnum = #{dartnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buildingdata = #{buildingdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
step = #{step,jdbcType=INTEGER},
missnum = #{missnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select info.uid as uid, info.nickname as nickname, info.avatar as avatar, data.rounds as rounds, data.${orderByName} as rounds from player_data data left join player_info info on data.openid=info.openid where info.channelid=#{channelid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by data.${orderByName} limit 50
